title: Items
content: lighter than if it were empty Potion of Acid Resistance Gain resistance to acid damage until your next long rest. Despite its reputation as a chalky and unappetising brew, a pleasing effervescence makes this potion easy to drink. Auntie Ethel's Charm Break this charm to receive all benefits from the Enhance Ability Spell until Long Rest: Bear's Endurance, Bull's Strength, Cat's Grace, Eagle's Splendour, Fox's Cunning, and Owl's Wisdom.
